description: Test prompts for Report generation at different complexity levels

simple: Generate a brief report summarizing the key points from the provided sources
Create a short overview of the main findings
Provide a concise summary of the data
standard: Generate a comprehensive report analyzing the data and providing insights
Create a detailed analysis with supporting evidence from all sources
Develop a well-structured report covering the main topics with clear sections
detailed: Generate an in-depth report with extensive analysis, examples, and recommendations
Create a thorough examination including methodology, findings, and implications
Produce a detailed analytical report with multiple perspectives and supporting data
comprehensive: Generate an exhaustive report covering all aspects with detailed analysis, multiple perspectives, and actionable recommendations
Create a complete analytical document with background, methodology, findings, discussion, conclusions, and future directions
Develop a fully comprehensive report with executive summary, detailed analysis, case studies, and strategic recommendations
